content: this terrifyingly cute t-rex by irene strange makes a plushy toy for children and grownups if you re a dinosaur fan bernard the project for you great for intermediate crocheters bernard is made using double and treble_crochet stitches his little dino arms spiky tail rosy cheeks and teenie fangs make him the friendliest dinosaur around and once you ve made bernard why not make him a fang-tastic friend
